question: What was the primary objective of Sukhmoy Chakravarty Committee formed in 1982?
option1: to form guidelines for opening of Private Sector Banks
option2: to consider merging of all cooperative banks
option3: to assess the functioning of the Indian Monetary system
answer: to assess the functioning of the Indian Monetary system
explanation: The Sukhamoy Chakravarty Committee was formed in December 1982 under the chairmanship of Prof. Sukhamoy Chakroborty to assess the functioning of the Indian Monetary system.
